description: Tougou Hifumi is a beautiful shogi player who attends Kosei High School, with Kitagawa Yusuke. During their school trip in Hawaii, she is rescued by Amamiya Ren from harassment by a group of rowdy Americans. Ren befriends her, learning of her domineering mother who is trying to use her beauty and skill in shogi as a cash cow, while learning to play shogi from her.
name: Tougou Hifumi
